name: Snowman's Adventure (Han L)
description:
Description:

The Snowman’s Adventure is a 2D platformer, adventure, and puzzle game where players control a resizable snowman to move and throw snowballs. Manipulate snowman’s size wisely to conquer tricky environment barriers and collect as many candy canes on the journey as possible!

Controls:

Move:  Left and Right Arrow Keys

Rotate Head: Up and Down Arrorw Keys

Resize Body: X and C

Throw snowballs: Z

Jump: No no no, snowman can not jump!
